div.p:
Online user 1:
So the basic formula for alcoholism is the same as heart disease, right?

Online user 2:
Yep. It's biology plus choice equals outcome. It's the same for any lifestyle-related health problem.

Online user 3:
Can't control my body... I mean, my biology.

Online user 4:
Right, I can't control my biology, but I can control my choices.
